button.title: about
button.description: Joy Gough is an Award Winning Location Portraiture specializing in wedding, family, children, commercial, and live event photography.

button.title: services
button.description: please feel free to contact me in regards to an appointment I offer photography services for just about any need you may have. I am available for consultations over the phone and by e-mail.

button.title: awards
button.description: Joy Gough is the winner of several awards and accolades for her work in photography. Awards include numorous awards for her portraits and wedding images.
